param.name: firestats_path
param.label: Firestats path
param.description:
Absolute path to FireStats system.
Example :
/var/www/firestats
You may use shortcut names like:
%server_root% for server's root directory
%joomla_root% for Joomla! root directory

Path has to be without '/' at the end.

param.name: firestats_site_id
param.label: Site ID
param.description: Site ID from FireStats site managment

param.name: exclude_administrators_from_stats
param.label: Exclude administrators
param.description: If this is selected, hits made by site administrators will not be recorded in FireStats
